citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:50 am on
08/03/2015. Front gate was closed and locked so to gain attention vehicle horn was honked several times.
Attempted to call licensee by contact numbers provided and messages were left. Inspector departed the facility at
10:20 am.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:50 am on
08/03/2015.  Front gate was closed and locked so to gain attention vehicle horn was honked several times. 
Attempted to call licensee by contact numbers provided and messages were left.  Inspector departed the facility at
10:20 am.
